comments.en:
For basic printing functionality use the HPIJS driver . For advanced functionality such as printer status and maintenance features, use the HPLIP driver (which includes HPIJS).

Large-format printer.

This is not a PostScript printer, the "ps" in the name is misleading.

Thanks to Oleksandr Shneyder (oleksandr dot shneyder at treuchtlingen dot de) for the info about getting this printer to work.
